Dependency=Geometry Building Type RECS: # Source: Constructed using 2017 American Housing Survey (AHS) microdata.
# Source: Building type categorization based on U.S. EIA 2009 Residential Energy Consumption Survey (RECS).
# Assumption: More than 5 bedrooms are labeled as 5 bedrooms and 0 bedrooms are labeled as 1 bedroom
